common.noData: Currently there is no data here!

home.text: An organization aiming for a single goal, to defend the interests of all students, addressing today's and tomorrow's challenges.
home.dividerLine: Every KTU student is an active and creating citizen, responsible leader of society.

about.description: The main activity of KTU SA is representing university students at the university and in the Lithuanian Students' Union.

forStudents.description: KTU SA is your voice in university. Engage with us to influence decisions and improve student life at KTU.

needHelp.description: KTU SA offers support and resources for any challenges you face. We're here to help you succeed.

representation.description: KTU SA ensures your voice is heard in university decisions. We advocate for student interests in academic and campus life.

seo.homeDescription: KTU Students' Association (KTU SA) represents all Kaunas University of Technology students. Find news, events, academic help, scholarships, and student resources.
